title: Sluggish elephant seal gets into burping competition with cameraman
text:
This is the incredible moment a sluggish seal seemed to get into a burping competition with a cameraman.

The hilarious footage was filmed on South Georgia Island in the Atlantic ocean on October 24 and features an elephant seal.

Lazing around on the beach, the seal suddenly let out a loud belch.

The cameraman, who is laughing throughout, responds with a burp of his own,

He burps several times to try and encourage the seal to belch again.

The animal obliges releases several incredibly loud burps that are so powerful that clouds of gas are pushed into the air.

The sound of the animal's burps were more like a car than a belch and clearly tickled the cameraman.

The elephant seal let out a series of burps after being encouraged by the laughing cameraman

Lazing around on the beach, the seal suddenly let out a loud belch, which the cameraman responded to with several of his own

After the seal was done with the burping marathon, it settled back down peacefully.

In the competition between the seal and the man, the winner was clear.

The seal stretched out comfortably as the video ended.
description: The hilarious footage was filmed on South Georgia Island in the Atlantic ocean on October 24 and features an elephant seal burping loudly and powerfully multiple times.
